Options.Label: Easy Anti-Cheat
Options.Description: Enable steam Easy Anti-Cheat runtime. You may have to install this from desktop mode from the steam store if it's not already installed.

Options.Label: BattlEye
Options.Description: Enable BattlEye runtime. You may have to install this from desktop mode from the steam store if it's not already installed.
Enable ESYNC. This can help with performance in some games, but can also cause issues in others.
Enable FSYNC. This can help with performance in some games, but can also cause issues in others.

Options.Label: Pulse Audio Latency ms
Options.Description: Enable PulseAudio latency fix. This can help with audio latency in some games, but can also cause issues in others.
Enable RADV performance test. This can help with performance in some games, but can also cause issues in others.

Options.Label: VKD3D
Options.Description: Enable VKD3D. This can help with performance in some games, but can also cause issues in others.

Options.Label: VKD3D-Proton
Options.Description: Enable VKD3D-Proton. This can help with performance in some games, but can also cause issues in others.

Options.Label: FSR Strength
Options.Description: Enable FidelityFX Super Resolution. This can help with performance in some games, but can also cause issues in others. 0 = Off, 1 = Ultra Performance, 2 = Performance, 3 = Balanced, 4 = Quality, 5 = Ultra Quality

Options.Label: Force Large Address Aware
Options.Description: Enable Large Address Aware. This can help with performance in some games, but can also cause issues in others.

Options.Label: Additional Variables
Options.Description: Additional variables to pass to the environment, usefull for things like WINEDEBUG=-all

Options.Label: Additional Arguments
Options.Description: Additional arguments to pass to the game, usefull for things like -nolauncher or -windowed

EnumValues.Description: work around to get Cygni running
EnumValues.Label: Cygni epic deployment id

Options.Label: Custom Mesa ICD
Options.Description: Custom Mesa ICD file to use, please make sure the file is in /home/(YOUR-USER-PROFILE-NAME)/mesa/share/vulkan/icd.d/radeon_icd.x86_64.json

Options.Label: Ignore EGS Arguments in launcher
Options.Description: Ignores the arguments passed by the Epic Games Store launcher
